text: We have installed a plugin that syncs data from Magneto to HubSpot. It uses extensions/ecomm/v2/sync/messages. Everything has been working great so far. The client recently wanted to add a few new attributes to the CONTACT profile. I created the attribute in both Magneto 2 and HubSpot. (created_in). I verified that the new attribute is being sent over via the API call. However the property is not being updated in HubSpot. The API returns a successful response and doing a callback on the contact (sync/status/default/CONTACT) it shows that it was updated with zero errors. Has anyone run into an issue where /v2/sync/messages is not updating all of the properties?

Hey everyone! I am currently using the HubSpot Python HubSpot API along with Eel.

Everything works fine, until I try to package the script into an .exe File using PyInstaller.

I ge tthe following error in the console as soon as I try to use part of the API:

```Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "eel\__init__.py", line 281, in _process_message
  File "C:\Users\User\Documents\New Page\SvelteEelPython\App\main.py", line 26, in py_getTicketID
    ticket_fetched = api_client.crm.tickets.basic_api.get_by_id(id)
  File "HubSpot\discovery\crm\tickets\discovery.py", line 9, in basic_api
  File "HubSpot\discovery\discovery_base.py", line 11, in _configure_api_client
  File "HubSpot\discovery\discovery_base.py", line 27, in _default_api_factory
  File "pkg_resources\__init__.py", line 891, in require
  File "pkg_resources\__init__.py", line 777, in resolve
pkg_resources.DistributionNotFound: The 'python-dateutil' distribution was not found and is required by HubSpot-api-client```
Using pip to install 'python-dateutil' did not fix this issue as it was already present in the project.

Has anybody ever dealt with this issue while using the Python API?

Hi everyone! I’m working with `Delay` action on Workflows using API. Is there a way to use the “Delay until a day or time” with API? The json object shows that just the “Delay for a set amount of time” event is support it. Thanks in advance

What plugin do you use?
